players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Investigate Bob, he seems suspicious."
You: "Will do, Diana. Keep an eye on Charlie."
Bob: "Will keep an eye on both of you, let's work together."
Bob: "Monitoring Charlie and Diana, keep the discussion focused on suspects."
You: "Will investigate Bob next. Keep an eye on both Charlie and Diana."
Diana: "Monitoring Alice, Bob. Stay cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

You: "Monitoring Charlie and Diana, keep the discussion focused on suspects."
Alice: "Will investigate Bob next. Keep an eye on both Charlie and Diana."
Diana: "Monitoring Alice, Bob. Stay cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

Day 1 begins.

Alice: "Will do, Diana. Keep an eye on Charlie."

Bob: "Monitoring Charlie and Diana, keep the discussion focused on suspects."
